numbered_ace_sentences: 1. There are different percentages between players of color and head coaches of color.
2. Players of color have a higher percentage than head coaches of color.
3. I wonder why head coaches of color have a low percentage.
5. This situation shows me that racism still exists.
6. There is a reason why head coaches of color have a low percentage.
8. Not many head coaches of color have an opportunity to be involved in major sports leagues.
10. The headline is: The diversity in sports.
